label: TTAnimal
comment: A Track and Trace (TT) animal or a group of animals, such as those kept or raised on a farm, ranch.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying the species type of this TT animal.

objectProperties.comment: The holder responsible party for this TT animal.
A location related to this TT animal.
The animal batch specified for this TT animal.
An animal certificate specified for this TT animal.
An animal holding event specified for this TT animal.
An animal identity specified for this TT animal.
The individual tracking animal specified for this TT animal.
A delimited period specified for this CS engineering coordinate reference system.
A species specified for this TT animal.

referencedBy.comment: A TT (Track and Trace) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm or ranch, related to this trade product.
